```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
library(DEP)
library(limma)
library(edgeR)
library("dplyr")
library(EnhancedVolcano)
```

```{r}
wes = read.table("../../data/genomic/WES_variants_processed.csv.gz", stringsAsFactors = F, sep = ",", header = T, check.names = F, row.names = 1)
mut_counts = data.frame(cbind(colnames(wes), colSums(wes)), stringsAsFactors = F)
colnames(mut_counts) = c("Gene", "mut_count")
```

```{r}
mut_counts[mut_counts$mut_count>10,"Gene"]
```
